reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here while on a foray to the wine region and had a fabulous visit. The hotel bedrooms are simply arranged but ideal, clean and airy; ours was overlooking a courtyard. The restaurant was absolutely superb. The patron is the chef and takes great pride and care in what he presents and dinner was exquisite. His son waits at table and has a great knowledge of regional wines. Altogether a successfull trip - we wilt try go again
reviews.title: Warmly welcomed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife & i have been coming to this restaurant/hotel for for than 15 years & have never had a bad experience. We have seen the ongoing upgrade to the restaurant |& then the accommodation, all done so well & with good taste. When we first visited the walls of the dining room were covered with a number of photographs of the Duke & Duchess of Windsor with their entourage many of them signed plus some signed menus from the 30's. A great place to stay with some of the best food in the region
reviews.title: Superb; as ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here while visiting the Loire chateaux and had an extremely comfortable room and enjoyed the great service and fabulous diners every night of our stay. Patrick and Monique and their son Max were the most kind and friendly hosts that we met anywhere during our two month trip around France and we look forward to our return.
reviews.title: A Real Gem--Wonderful Owners, Accomodation and Cuisine!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was fantastic. He has plentiful and secure parking, a walled garden. Our room was spotlessly clean, very comfortable, light, airy and well furnished. The large bathroom was well equipped with two sinks. There is a shower, corner bath and separate wc. The bed was very comfortable and the room well airconditionned. The food in the restaurant was excellent and the staff were friendly, extremely helpful and charming. To conclure, this hotel is fabulous to discover the Loire Valley and i hope to return very quickly.
reviews.title: Superb

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food and service could not be bettered; but good on all ratings. We had 3 nights of indulgence. It is handy for Tours city, seeing the Loire chateaux and easy to reach from the Autoroute.
reviews.title: A perfect place for a long weekend break

reviews.text: I spent three nights at the Mère Hamard at the end of July on a short tour of the Loire castles and I found the place absolutely pleasant. The rooms were very nice and clean, the service attentive and the staff extremely helpful. Only regret (due to a pretty tight sightseeing schedule), I had no chance to try their restaurant: it will be for next time...
reviews.title: A wonderful place in Touraine...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay at the hotel Mere Hamard. Everyone there was so kind to us. The restaurant food was excellent and reasonable. The room was very comfortable and very clean. We hope to go back soon !
reviews.title: Wonderful !!!

likes.liked: — the friendly staff and the amazing food

reviews.text: This hotel is a great spot to stay in the Loire Valley if you are looking for value for money rather than the bigger more tourist oriented hotels.
reviews.title: A great place to stay

reviews.text: As an english couple who speak no French, the staff was extremly pleasant and helpful. The rooms are comfortable, clean and newly decorated. And there were all the modern amenities including free wifi, flat screen tv and a great bathroom with bath AND shower. The breakfast and the food in the restaurant were gorgeous !
reviews.title: Very disappointed

likes.liked: — Spacious room, good bathroom, comfortable surroundings
likes.disliked: — Dreadful service in restaurant. Made to feel very unwelcome. Constantly trying to attract attention of staff.

reviews.text: I would highly recommend this hotel!
reviews.title: Perfect Adress

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Mere Hamard is a delightful family run hotel in a typical French village - in the heart of the Loire Valley. There is always a warm welcome from Mr or Mme Pegué, their son Max or a member of their competent staff. The rooms are very comfortable with attractive furnishings and the bathrooms are super. The food is delicious with interesting regional dishes and an imaginative modern cuisine. It's a hotel where you will want to return time after time, but book early or you may be disappointed
reviews.title: A very special place to stay and a great restaurant!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My Husband and I recently stayed in this " Relais du Silence" and we absolutely loved it. Our room was comfortable, well-furnished and very clean. The location is very quiet ( we didn't hear a sound all night !) and is a perfect base to visit the Loire Valley castles.
reviews.title: Fabulous !

reviews.text: But make sure to eat in the restaurant. The food was amazing. The meals we had here were the best that we had during our two-weeks vacation in France. And all the staff was very helpul and friendly.
reviews.title: Superb find

likes.liked: — The quality furnishins in the room and bathroom as well as the restaurant
likes.disliked: — We were given a room on the second floor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would highly recommand this hotel !
reviews.title: Wonderful place in the heart of France!

likes.disliked: — Air conditioning had a difficult time keeping up with the heat (summer of 2006 was very bad)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hostellerie should be on everybody's place to stay list. The decor in the reception rooms and bedrooms is absolutely charming and sooooo French! The food was wonderful. It should have a Michelin star! Our room was on the top floor of the main building and we had the most restful nights sleep. We left an item in the room when we left and this was posted back to us immediately. Thank you to everybody who looked after us so well.
reviews.title: Not to be missed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed overnight on our way back north in early June 2012 having chosen this hotel for its food and quiet location. It did not disapoint; the food was classic, but light french, with good flavour whilst the hotel room, in the main premises, was quiet and restful We will stay again.
reviews.title: Old fashioned service and food but with style.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had chosen the hotel because it was listed as a "relais du silence" and were surprised to find out it was in the centre of the small village of Sablençay! But it turned out it was absolutely quiet except for the church bell that rang at 8 in the morning.
reviews.title: Parsonage turned into country hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are old-fashioned but the entirely refurbished bathrooms have everything you need.
reviews.title: Fantastic Experience!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dinner was absolutely awesome and creative, the staff extremely pleasant. Breakfast was a treat and we enjoyed having the chef-owner come and serve us in the morning. We engaged in a long discussion on French cuisine and its evolution. An unforgettable experience.
reviews.title: Delightful stay
